title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 149-2.1 - Scope of subpart
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 149-2.1 - Scope of subpart

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to establish educational
and fiscal standards for the use of the setaside for attendance improvement and
dropout prevention pursuant to the provisions of paragraph f of subdivision 12
of section
3602
of the

Education Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
149-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
